snippet: The American car manufacturer swept the top three places in the 1966 race, stunning its Italian rival, which had won the five previous editions of the endurance race.
lead_paragraph: The American car manufacturer swept the top three places in the 1966 race, stunning its Italian rival, which had won the five previous editions of the endurance race.

headline.main: When Ford Conquered Ferrari at Le Mans
headline.content_kicker: Special Report: 24 Hours of Le Mans
headline.print_headline: When Ford Conquered Ferrari at Le Mans
